text: Mighty Morphin Alien Rangers is a Power Rangers mini-series. The story takes place after the end of the third season of Mighty Morphin Power Rangers. A sequel called Power Rangers Zeo was started in 1996. Its it a based on Super Sentai series Ninja Sentai Kakuranger. During fight scenes (and during the opening of the show) an alternate version of the MMPR theme song was played, saying "Go Go Alien Rangers" instead of "Go Go Power Rangers", although the premiere episode "Alien Rangers of Aquitar" still uses the "Go Go Power Rangers" theme. It is season 3.5 of the Power Rangers franchise. ==Characters== Actor Name Rangers Zord David Bacon Aurico Red Aquitian Ranger Red Shogun Zord Karim Prince Cestro Blue Aquitian Ranger Blue Shogun Zord Jim Gray Tideus Yellow Aquatian Ranger Yellow Shogun Zord Alan Palmer Corcus Black Aquatian Ranger Black Shogun Zord Rajia Badouri Delphine White Aquitian Ranger White Shogun Zord ==Cast== ===Rangers=== * David Bacon as Aurico/Red Aquitian Ranger. * Karim Prince as Cestro/Blue Aquitian Ranger. * Jim Gray as Tideus/Yellow Aquitian Ranger. * Alan Palmer as Corcus/Black Aquitian Ranger. * Rajia Baroudi as Delphine/White Aquitian Ranger. ===Supporting Characters=== * David Yost as Billy Cranston. * Justin Timsit as Young Billy. * Michael R. Gotto as Young Tommy. * Michael J. O'Laskey as Young Rocky. * Matthew Sakimoto as Young Adam. * Sicily as Young Aisha. * Julia Jordan as Young Katherine. * Khanya Mkhize as Young Tanya. * Jason David Frank as Tommy Oliver. * Steve Cardenas as Rocky DeSantos. * Johnny Yong Bosch as Adam Park. * Karan Ashley as Aisha Campbell. * Catherine Sutherland as Katherine "Kat" Hillard. * Nakia Burrise as Tanya Sloan. * Robert L. Samya as Young Skull. * Paul Schrier as Farkus "Bulk" Bulkmeier. * Jason Narvy as Eugene "Skull" Skullovitch. ==Related pages== * Power Rangers * Mighty Morphin Power Rangers * Power Rangers Zeo * Power Rangers Turbo ==Other websites== * Official Power Rangers Website * Category:1996 American television series debuts Category:1996 American television series endings Category:Mighty Morphin Power Rangers Category:English-language television programs
